name: DaZombie
description:
This is perhaps the BEST game you have ever played without sound!

It is a 3rd person bird's eye view shooter in which you have to defend against waves of zombies, collecting zombie parts and crafting your way to victory!

I made EVERYTHING in this game myself except perhaps the game engine I was running on. That would be too hard!

It has 6 levels with 7 codexes sprinkled throughout which tell you a bit about the world! If you want a hint of where to find them, post a comment below!

You will undoubtedly like this game and maybe even support me on Patreon!

patreon.com/gamingtortoise

 I didn't put it in because I thought you might as well put on some music that you actually like!
